verbose_text: Overall, our data support and extend previous work showing that the Notch pathway is necessary for the formation of perivascular cells from the cranial neural crest, by showing that constitutively active Notch1 promotes a perivascular cell fate in frontonasal mesenchyme, and perhaps also in glial progenitors on the olfactory nerve, several days after the end of cranial neural crest migration.
evidence: Notch1 promotes a perivascular cell fate
